did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Papers regarding various ILR School Extension programs.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: A graduate of Cornell University (PhD, history), Christopher Lindley was Senior Extension Associate at the New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations at Cornell University.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: United States. Department of Housing and Urban Development.
New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations --Faculty.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Christopher Lindley Papers #/3013. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
